sections.title: Welcome to PawWalks
sections.subtitle: Connecting Dog Owners with Trusted Walkers
sections.name: Hero Section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Discover peace of mind with our seamless dog walking service. Connect with vetted dog walkers and schedule walks that fit your lifestyle.

images.name: Happy Puppers
images.description: A group of happy dogs on a walk with their walker, illustrating the joy and care provided by PawWalks.

sections.title: About PawWalks
sections.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Pet Care
sections.name: About Section
sections.label: About
sections.content: At **PawWalks**, we believe in providing compassionate and reliable care for your furry family members. Our platform connects dog owners with trusted walkers, ensuring every walk is a joyous and safe experience.

images.name: How It Works
images.description: An infographic illustrating the easy three-step process for dog owners and walkers using PawWalks.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Tailored Solutions for Every Walker and Owner
sections.name: Services Section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### For Dog Walkers  
- **Self Registration**: Create your profile with ease.  
- **Set Availability**: Choose your preferred days and time slots.  
- **Manage Requests**: Accept or decline walk requests seamlessly.  
- **Customized Pricing**: Set your rates based on dog size.  

### For Dog Owners  
- **Find Walkers**: Match with walkers that fit your schedule.  
- **Secure Payments**: Easy payment after service with third-party billing.

images.name: Service Mindmap
images.description: A visual mindmap outlining all the services and benefits offered by PawWalks to both walkers and owners.

sections.title: Join Our Community
sections.subtitle: Become a Walker or Find a Trusted One!
sections.name: CallToAction Section
sections.label: Join Us
sections.content: Ready to take the next step? Whether you are an owner in need of assistance or a walker looking to join our network, **sign up today** and experience the excellence of **PawWalks.**

images.name: Sign Up Now
images.description: A visually appealing banner urging new users to join the PawWalks community.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: We're Here to Help
sections.name: Contact Section
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Have questions, feedback, or need support? Reach out to us, and we'll be happy to assist.  
Email: support@pawwalks.com  
Phone: (123) 456-7890  
Address: 123 Pet Street, Dog City, DC 10101

images.name: Office Location
images.description: A map showing the location of the PawWalks office for easy navigation.

sections.title: FAQs
sections.subtitle: Your Questions Answered
sections.name: FAQ Section
sections.label: FAQ
sections.content:
**How do I register as a walker?**  
Simply navigate to our Walker Registration page, fill out your details, and start setting your schedule.  

**Can I change my walking schedule?**  
Absolutely! You can update your availabilities anytime through your profile settings.  

**How is payment processed?**  
Payments are handled securely via third-party billing once the walk is completed.

images.name: Question Icon
images.description: A small icon representing FAQ to direct attention to commonly asked questions.
